text: @realDonaldTrump I have never seen people as wicked as the democrats. Killing Americans just because you want to us covid-19 death as a campaign against @realDonaldTrump . Sleepy Joe has been in government and has done significantly nothing, yet you guys see him as the saviour. What a shame
